message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth $10,000. This reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features it offers. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $10,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to buy it for $8,500, which is still a good price for both of us.  Let me know what you think.
